channel.title: Posts on 贼雕
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 贼雕

item.title: The Color of Autumn
item.description: The Color Of Autumn As autumn comes, it gets cooler and cooler. Look the skr is blue and the clouds are white. l would say autumn is blue and white. Birds are flying from the north to the south. The leaves are yellow. Some are hanging on the trees and some are on the ground. Others are fluttering down in the light wind. Someone would say autumn is yellow. There are so many fruits in autumn in countyside seach as pears, peaches, mangos, oranges and so on. They’r fresh and health. Oh, l see! Autumn is a harvest season. Autumn

item.title: Water
item.description: water is important Water is very important to us, without water , we will die We can eat noting for few days, but we must drink water every day what’s more, if there is no water, the plants will not grow, and no animals could live Therefore, there will no food for us Howerer, the water has been severely polluted nowadays, much water is not suiteble for drink We must protecte water for our human beings and our planet, without it, there would be no life any longer in earth overView This passage said water is important. If there was

item.title: 田家四季歌
item.description: 春季里国, 春风吹, 花开草长蝴蝶飞. 麦苗儿多嫩, 桑叶儿正肥. 夏季里, 农事忙, 采了蚕桑又插秧. 早起勤耕作, 归来戴月光. 秋季里, 稻上场, 谷像黄金粒粒香. 身体虽辛苦, 心里喜洋洋. 冬季里, 雪初晴, 新制棉衣暖又轻

item.title: 树之歌
item.description: sample 杨树高,榕树壮, 梧桐树叶像手掌. 枫树秋天叶儿红, 松柏四季披绿装. 木棉喜暖在南方, 桦树耐寒守北疆. 银杏水杉活化石, 金桂开花满院香. overview 这是一首简短的顺口溜,除了简短的特性外,顺口溜之所有叫顺口溜,就是它

item.title: 找春天
item.description:
春天来了! 春天来了!

我们几个孩子脱掉棉袄, 冲出家门, 奔向田野, 去寻找春天.

春天像个害羞的小姑娘, 遮遮掩掩, 躲躲藏藏. 我们仔细地找哇, 找哇.

item.title: 传统节日
item.description: 春节到, 人欢笑, 贴窗花, 放鞭炮. 元宵节, 看花灯, 大街小巷人如潮. 清明节, 雨纷纷, 先人墓前去我祭扫. 过端午, 赛尤舟, 粽香艾香满堂飘. 七月七, 来乞巧, 牛郎织女会鹊桥. 过中秋, 吃月饼, 十五圆月当空照. 重阳节

item.title: 夜色
item.description:
我从前胆子很小很小,

天一黑就不敢往外上瞧.

item.title: 怎么都快乐
item.description:
一个人玩,很好!

独自一个,静悄悄的,

正好用纸折船, 折马……

踢毽子, 跳绳, 搭积木,

当然还有看书, 画画, 听音乐……
